data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance for Interest Subsidy - Manufacturing Sector - SC/ST - Female - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides interest subsidy upto 8% amounting to maximum 35 Lakhs with additional  interest subsidy subject to fulfilment of conditions.
data.eligibility:
1. SC/ST/Differently-able, Women related MSMEs and Startups in Manufacturing sectors as per eligible category of taluka mentioned in Additional Information. 

2. Enterprise which installs solar power plant/other renewable power plants will be eligible for interest subsidy. 

3. Service enterprise having service tax registration are only eligible for incentive. 

4. Should get shop and establishment registration from Municipal Corporation.
data.conditions:
1. Eligible enterprise shall have to bear minimum 2% interest levied on term loan by Bank/Financial Institution (Except NBFC).
  2. An existing enterprise that installs a solar power plant or any other renewable power plant for captive consumption in the premises will be eligible for interest subsidy in accordance with the location of the Enterprise.
  3. If the term loan is sanctioned after one year from the date of loan disbursement or commencement of commercial production(whichever is later), the enterprise will not be eligible for interest subsidy.
  4. Only new building, new plant and machinery/equipment and second hand imported machinery will be eligible for incentives
  5. Enterprise will have to employ 85% of the total employment and 60% of supervisory and managerial staff from local persons
  6. Existing or New Enterprise carrying out an activity of forwarding/Backward Integration and Diversification with an investment of more than 25% (out of which minimum 60% investment should be in Plant and Machinery) of Gross Fixed Capital Investment will be eligible.
  7. Enterprise shall opt for eligibility of interest subsidy from the date of disbursement or commencement whichever is later.
  8. If an enterprises is located in geographical limit of more than one taluka ,than the taluka which has largest percentage of area will considered in eligible category.
  9. If enterprises has availed interest subsidy under scheme of central govt then the total quantum of subsidy from State and Central shall not exceed the total interest paid to Bank/Financial institution.
  10. Enterprise will have to remain in production for atleast 7 years from the date of commercial production.
  11. Service enterprises shall have service tax registration are eligible for incentive under this scheme. Following services are need to comply with below two additional conditions: -Financial Services -Health Services -Transport and Logistics Services -Audio Visual Services -Construction related Engineering services. -Environmental services
    • Service Enterprise shall have to give employment to atleast minimum 10 persons.
    • Service enterprise must have GST Registration.
data.beneficiaries:
1. SC/ST/Differently-able, Women related MSMEs and Startups in Manufacturing sectors as per eligible category of taluka mentioned in Additional Information. 

2. Enterprise which installs solar power plant/other renewable power plants will be eligible for interest subsidy. 

3. Service enterprise having service tax registration are only eligible for incentive. 

4. Should get shop and establishment registration from Municipal Corporation.

data.context: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME Division of Government of Gujarat launched Scheme for Assistance to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME)-Assistance for Interest Subsidy on term loan to help MSMEs of SC/ST
data.objective: To provide interest subsidy on term loan to MSMEs for ease of doing business.
data.description:
A) Manufacturing sector- 

  • Category I Taluka - Interest subsidy of 8% on term loan, with the maximum limit of Rs. 35 lakhs per annum for a period of 7 years 
  • Category II Taluka - Interest subsidy of 7% on term loan, with the maximum limit of Rs. 30 lakhs per annum for a period of 6 years 
  • Category III Taluka and Municipal Corporation areas- Interest subsidy of 6% on term loan, with the maximum limit of Rs. 25 lakhs per annum for a period of 5 years. 
  • 1% additional interest subsidy to differently-abled entrepreneur, Women entrepreneur and registered start-up in the manufacturing sector 
  • 1% additional interest subsidy to young entrepreneur below the age of 35 years on the date of sanction of term loan. 
  • 1% additional interest subsidy to registered start-up in the service sector and having Udhyam registration as MSME.
     

B) Service Sector- 

  • Category I Taluka - Interest subsidy of 8% on term loan, with the maximum limit of Rs. 35 lakhs per annum for a period of 7 years 
  • Category II Taluka - Interest subsidy of 7% on term loan, with the maximum limit of Rs. 30 lakhs per annum for a period of 6 years 
  • Category III Taluka and Municipal Corporation areas- Interest subsidy of 6% on term loan, with the maximum limit of Rs. 25 lakhs per annum for a period of 5 years. 
  • 1% additional interest subsidy to registered service startups & having udhyam Registration.
data.how_to_apply: Applicants can apply online within one year from the date of the first disbursement of the loan, or on or before the date of commencement of commercial production, whichever is later.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism:
1. The amount will be disbursed in 10 working days to the applicant, subject to the availability of grant
  2. The amount of assistance will be release in two installments :-
    • 50% of the sanctioned assistance will be disbursed by MSME Commissioner Office as per availability of the grant after the publication /notification of the patent
    • Remaining 50% assistance will be disbursed after issuance of certificate of patent by competent authority.
data.additional_info:
The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail asssistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
  • Category I:Ahmedabad - Dholera Ahmedabad - Detroj-Rampura Ahmedabad - Dhanduka Amreli - Khambha Amreli -Dhari Amreli -Lilia Amreli - Savar Kundla Amreli - Babra Amreli - Kunkavav Vadia Amreli-Lathi Anand -Tarapur Anand - data.checklist_info_a:
1. KYC Documents (Identity and Address proof) 
2. Caste Certificate. 
3. Udyam Registration Certificate 
4. Invoices regarding the purchase and installation of Solar Power Plants 
5. Purchase agreement for the purchase of New Building, Plant & machinery. 
6. Employee master data which contain details regarding all the employees 
7. Statement showing the new and existing Enterpriseâ€™s Gross Fixed Capital Investment.
